page.title: 05RESIDENTS'NEWSLETTER SEPT'85
page.content: {BEST KEPT GARDEN COMPETITION Winner to be announced next month. {BONFIRE NIGHT Fireworks at a cost of Â£218 have been ordered.Further details next month. {LUNCHEON CLUB Lunch provided in Community Centre every Wednesday,12.30pm. {WARNING} Youths are paying night visits to back gardens in Kinderton grove.(607114) {YOUTH CLUB Sponsered run,Sunday September 22nd. {POLICE SURGERY P.C.Alan Kilding in Community Centre 26th September 10.30 TO 11.00am. {TODDINGTON PLAY AREA Would children refrain from using cricket balls and riding bikes in this area. Discussions regarding fence are in motion. {APPEAL}Spare kitchen units?See MrNoble
